etomica.models.oneDHardRods

Class MeterWidomMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.data.DataSourceScalar
      • etomica.models.oneDHardRods.MeterWidomMode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataSource, IEtomicaDataSource

    public class MeterWidomMode
extends DataSourceScalar
    Uses a Widom-like insertion of a mode to calculate a probability.
